short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blue Lock Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Blue Lock background. Blue Lock wallpaper background theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a dynamic Blue Lock wallpaper experience with automatic shuffling upon opening a new tab.
2. Customize your Blue Lock background by either randomizing it or favoriting it within the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Conveniently utilize the Google search bar for quick and efficient web searches.
4. Instantly access your emails and social media accounts for seamless connectivity.
5. Stay updated with the current date and time displayed automatically.
6. Utilize the New Note feature to jot down and organize your tasks efficiently.
7. Effortlessly reach your most frequently visited websites with easy-to-use shortcuts.
8. Manage your bookmarks conveniently with quick access at your fingertips.
9. Enhance accessibility by adding websites to the Shortcut panel for swift navigation.
10. Quickly access Google apps for a streamlined online experience.
11. Explore a variety of themes easily with quick access to More Themes.
12. Share your experiences effortlessly on social media with the easy sharing feature.
13. Speedily download wallpapers with a one-click access option.
14. Instantly jump into gaming with quick access to play games.
15. Elevate your Blue Lock new tab experience by enabling entertaining animations like fun snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks.
